instructions: From any Home screen, tap the Messages icon. Tap and hold on the desired message thread until Message options appears. Tap Block contact .
From any Home screen, tap the Messages icon. Tap the Menu icon. Tap Block list . Select the contact to unblock. Tap the Menu icon . Tap Unblock contacts .
From any Home screen, tap the Messages icon. Touch and hold the message thread you want to delete. Tap Delete . Tap OK .
From any Home screen, tap the Messages icon. Touch and hold the message thread you want to delete. Tap Delete . Tap OK .
From any Home screen, tap the Messages icon. Select the desired message thread. Tap and hold on the picture until Messaging options appears. Tap Save .
